channel.title: Siri Shortcuts on Zack McCauley - WardsParadox
channel.description: Recent content in Siri Shortcuts on Zack McCauley - WardsParadox

item.title: Force a DEP sync..from your phone!
item.description: I've used Workflow in the past, but I hadn't really fully explored it as "click this" instead of "launch this app and run this real quick" never bothered me. Things have changed since then. Hello to Siri Shortcuts in iOS 12! I can now run things by voice.
